messages.wikimod.command.wiki.help:
§aOpens a known wiki.
§7Usage: §8/wiki §7<§6namespace§7> <§6url§7>
§7If no namespace is specified defaults to 'minecraft'
§7Example: §8/wiki §6create crushing wheel
§7Example: §8/wiki §6spawn chunks
messages.wikimod.open_thing.failure: Failed to open your browser at '%s'!
wikimod.config.category.main.title: Wiki Mod
wikimod.config.category.main.wikis.label: Fandom Wiki's
wikimod.config.category.main.wikis.descr:
Fandom Wiki's to open in your browser.

§cHas to be in the format of §r'§7<namespace>;<https://[fandom_url]>§c' or '§7<namespace>;<subdomain>§c' or '§7<namespace>;<fandom_url>§c'.

§aThe namespace is used to make blocks from a certain mod open for that particular wiki.§r

§6Example:
§f'§7minecraft;minecraft§f'. §aAny block that is from §f'§7minecraft§f'§a will open minecraft.fandom.com.
